title: I have to touch below the icon, link, or area of the screen I want to select it or it selects high.
content:
After a factory reset, the mapping of physical touch on the screen to the area the Pixel 5 recognizes as being touched appears to be off. For instance, to select an icon with a label I have to aim for the label at the bottom. If I aim for the actual icon, it selects whatever is above the icon. 
I can't find a way to recalibrate the touch function.
Any help is appreciated.
